fields.description: How to format and present values in the financial report (only if different from column fieldtype)

fields.description: Color to highlight values (e.g., red for exceptions)

fields.label: Bold Text
fields.description: Bold text for emphasis (totals, major headings)

fields.label: Italic Text
fields.description: Italic text for subtotals or notes

fields.label: Hide If Zero
fields.description: Hide this line if amount is zero

fields.description: Show negative values as positive (for expenses in P&L)
